description: Rescue animal Oskar is saved by Alderney residents after getting stuck in a rabbit-hole for 42 hours.
title: Alderney's community rescues missing dog from rabbit-hole
title_page: Alderney's community rescues missing dog from rabbit-hole - BBC News
maintext: "It was absolutely awful weather at some points and people were out walking until late at night. Even people who weren't able to come down were checking gardens and keeping in touch.
